H0.text: Frog is an organism that is a decomposer.

H1.text: Worm is an organism that serves as a decomposer, breaking down dead organic matter.

H2.text: Oak tree is the organism identified as a decomposer in the question.

H3.text: Grasshopper is an organism that acts as a decomposer.

A4.text: Earthworms are one of nature's most important detritivores and coprophages.
